snippet: Obama’s chief of staff, William M. Daley, will step down at the end of the president’s current term in January 2013, Mr. Daley told a Chicago television station.
lead_paragraph: Obama’s chief of staff, William M. Daley, will step down at the end of the president’s current term in January 2013, Mr. Daley told a Chicago television station.

headline.main: Obama Chief of Staff Says He’ll Leave in January 2013
headline.print_headline: Obama Chief of Staff Says He’ll Leave in January 2013
headline.seo: William M. Daley Says He Will Leave in January 2013
